maqras.text: And He is who mixed/set loose the two large bodies of water that (is) fresh/delightful very sweet/fresh, and that is salty salty and bitter, and He made/put between them (B) a barrier and (an) obstruction obstructed
And He is who created from the water a human so He made/put him a relationship/kinship and relations through marriage, and your Lord was/is capable/able/overpowering
And they worship from other that God what does not benefit them, and nor harms them, and the disbeliever was/is on (against) his Lord a supporter/helper
And We did not send you except (as) an announcer of good news and a warner
Say: "I do not ask/demand of you on it from a wage/fee except who willed/wanted that he takes to His Lord a way/path
And rely/depend on the alive/live who does not die, and praise/glorify with His praise/gratitude , and enough/sufficient with Him, with His worshippers`/slaves` crimes (as) an expert/experienced

Who created the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth and what is between them both in six days, then He aimed/tended to on the throne , the merciful, so ask/question with Him (about) an expert/experienced
And if (it) was said to them: "Prostrate to the merciful." They said: "And what (is) the merciful? Do we prostrate to what you order/command us?" And (it) increased them hastening away with aversion
Blessed (is) who made/put in the sky/space constellations and He made/put in it a lamp (light) and a luminous moon
And He is who made/put the night and the daytime different/succeeding (one another) to who wanted that he remembers or wanted gratefulness
And the merciful`s worshippers/slaves (are) those who walk on the land/earth quietly/tranquilly , and if the lowly/ignorant conversed with them , they said: "Greeting/peace
And those who spend the night to their Lord prostrating and keeping up
And those who say: "Our Lord divert from us Hell`s torture, that truly its torture was/is destruction
That it truly was bad/harmful a settlement/establishment and residence
And those who if they spent, they did not waste/extravagate and they did not tighten/restrict and economize, and was (were) between that just

And those who do not call with God another god, and they do not kill the self that God forbade except with the right/just , and they do not commit adultery/fornication , and who makes/does that, he meets/finds (a) sins` punishment/compensation
The torture be doubled/multiplied for him (on) the Resurrection Day, and he be immortal/eternal in it, humiliated/disgraced
Except who repented and believed and made/did correct/righteous deeds, so those God exchanges/substitutes their sins/crimes (by) goodnesses, and God was/is forgiving, merciful
And who repented and made/did correct/righteous deeds, so that he truly repents to God repentance
And those who do not witness/testify the falsehood/false testimony , and if they passed by the nonsense/senseless talk they passed generously/kindly
And those who if they were reminded with their Lord`s verses/evidences , they do not fall down on it deafly and blindly/confusedly
And those who say: "Our Lord grant/present us from our spouses and our descendants eyes`/sight`s delight/satisfaction , and make/put us to the believers (as) an example
Those, they are being rewarded/reimbursed the chamber/elevated stage because (of) what they were patient, and they will receive in it a greeting and a greeting/peace
Immortally/eternally in it, (it) became a good/beautiful position/settlement and residence
Say: "My Lord does not care/bother with you, where it not for your call/prayer so you had lied/denied/falsified, so (your punishment) will be (a) necessity/obligation
